span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 不活跃的：lacking force, vitality, or spirit
【例】an anemic economic recovery. 毫无活力的经济复苏
【例】Investors are worried about the stock's anemic performance. 投资者担心股市低迷的表现。
【近】sapless, infirm, feeble, decrepit[dɪ'krepɪt], wan, pale, pallid['pælɪd], effete[ɪ'fiːt], lethargic
【反】vigorous, spirited 精力充沛的；forceful 有力量的
